record.description: University Press Building cornerstone laying. First row, left to right: Newman Miller, Press director; J. Laurence Laughlin, Political Economy department head; William Rainey Harper, university president; John D. Rockefeller; Paul Shorey. Second row, left to right: Martin Ryerson, board of trustees president; trustees, Andrew MacLeish, Adolphus C. Bartlett, J. P. Iddings; Thomas C. Chamberlain, geology professor; and, Arthur Bestor, Geology department head.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: 2 copies (one with original caption) in Oversize B, box II. Attached to cardboard back.
